name: cull
desc: UNIQUE – REAP: Killing a minion grants an additional 1 Gold, up to a maximum of 100 Gold 100. After having killed 100 minions, grants an additional 350 Gold and permanently disables this passive.

name: dark seal
desc: UNIQUE – GLORY: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill and 1 stack for each assist, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. Lose 5 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to Mejai's Soulstealer. UNIQUE – DREAD: Gain 4 ability power for each stack of Glory.

name: doran's ring
desc: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions. UNIQUE – DRAIN: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you cannot gain mana, heal for「 45% of this value 」instead.

name: doran's shield
desc: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions. UNIQUE – ENDURE: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 45 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to「 66% effectiveness 」 if owned by ranged champions or when triggered by area of effect, damage over time, or proc.

name: gustwalker hatchling
desc: UNIQUE: After your pet reaches its final evolution, consumes this item to grant you the Gustwalker buff.

name: mosstomper seedling
desc: UNIQUE: After your pet reaches its final evolution, consumes this item to grant you the Mosstomper buff.

name: relic shield
desc: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions below (Melee role 50% / Ranged role 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills. UNIQUE – QUEST: Earn 500 Gold using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.

name: scorchclaw pup
desc: UNIQUE: After your pet reaches its final evolution, consumes this item to grant you the Scorchclaw buff.

name: spectral sickle
desc: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 12 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging basic attacks and abilities against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20 Gold. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills. UNIQUE – QUEST: Earn 500 Gold using this item to upgrade to Harrowing Crescent, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.

name: spellthief's edge
desc: tUNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 12 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging basic attacks and abilities against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20 Gold. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills. UNIQUE – QUEST: Earn 500 Gold using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.

name: steel shoulderguards
desc: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions below (Melee role 50% / Ranged role 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills. UNIQUE – QUEST: Earn 500 Gold using this item to upgrade to Runesteel Spaulders, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.

name: tear of the goddess
desc: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions. UNIQUE – MANA CHARGE: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if they are a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
